text: Junūb meṅ us kī sarhad Dariyā-e-Yardan par Laqqūm se shurū huī aur maġhrib kī taraf chaltī chaltī Yabniyel, Adāmī-naqb, Ailon-zānanīm aur Halaf se ho kar Aznūt-tabūr tak pahuṅchī. Wahāṅ se wuh maġhribī sarhad kī haisiyat se Huqqoq ke pās āī. Naftālī kī junūbī sarhad Zabūlūn kī shimālī sarhad aur maġhrib meṅ Āshar kī mashriqī sarhad thī. Dariyā-e-Yardan aur Yahūdāh Yahāṅ Yahūdāh kā matlab Mulk-e-Basan ho saktā hai jo Manassī ke ilāqe meṅ thā lekin jis par Yahūdāh ke qabīle ke mard Yāīr ne fatah pāī thī.  us kī mashriqī sarhad thī.
